verses.verse: May Yahweh<WH3068> answer<WH6030> you in the day<WH3117> of trouble.<WH6869> May the name<WH8034> of the God<WH430> of Jacob<WH3290> set you up on high,<WH7682>
send<WH7971> you help<WH5828> from the sanctuary,<WH6944> grant you support<WH5582> from Zion,<WH6726>
remember<WH2142> all your offerings,<WH4503> and accept<WH1878> your burnt sacrifice.<WH5930> Selah.<WH5542>
May He grant<WH5414> you your heart<WH3824>'s desire,<WH4390> and fulfill all your counsel.<WH6098>
We will triumph<WH7442> in your salvation.<WH3444> In the name<WH8034> of our God,<WH430> we will set up our banners.<WH1713> May Yahweh grant all your requests.<WH3068>

Now I know<WH3045> that Yahweh<WH3068> saves<WH3467> his anointed.<WH4899> He will answer<WH6030> him from his holy<WH6944> heaven,<WH8064> with the saving<WH3468> strength<WH1369> of his right hand.<WH3225>
Some trust in chariots,<WH7393> and some in horses,<WH5483> but we trust<WH2142> the name<WH8034> of Yahweh<WH3068> our God.<WH430>
They are bowed down<WH3766> and fallen,<WH5307> but we rise<WH6965> up,<WH5749> and stand upright.
Save,<WH3467> Yahweh!<WH3068> Let the King<WH4428> answer<WH6030> us when<WH3117> we call!<WH7121>
